byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and FAHIM ABED

lead_paragraph: The shooting, which some officials say left as many as 13 people dead, seemingly adds to a string of attacks singling out ethnic or sectarian minorities.
snippet: The shooting, which some officials say left as many as 13 people dead, seemingly adds to a string of attacks singling out ethnic or sectarian minorities....

headline.main: Gunmen Attack Hazara Miners in Afghanistan, Killing at Least 9
headline.print_headline: Afghans Say 9 Are Killed in Ambush of Hazaras
